title: Looking for a team (Bronze-Silver)
body:
Hi I'm a regular player of league of legends looking to find a team to play norms/ranked with.
So let me tell you a little bit about myself.I've been playing league of legends on and off for about 6 years I play the game quite a lot. I main top but can go anylane and play decently. I live in new Zealand (North island). I play this game for fun but can be quite competitive (Sometimes). I like to think that I'm a pretty chill person and don't judge others by there skill level as they will  get better over time.The reason I want to make a team is because I don't like solo que as you get a lot of toxic players (And of course to have fun).

Team requirements
Age: 14+
Mood:Humouress
Skype or TeamSpeak (Pref Skype)
The ability to play everyday (afternoon)
The ability to have fun playing league
The ability to work as a team


Add me in game (I'm not the best player in the world)
Have a great day!

replies.body:
adc mid sup add plz
in nz ashvages

IGN: Support Lane
Age: 21
Mains: ADC main but i wanna play on my support smurf and a Support.

Got skype and a tone of 5s exp just looking to get Sup smurf up to Gold :)

IGN: Abyswalker
Age: 18
Mains: Top/ Jg
have skype

Hi im interested in joining
Age:15
Mains: Adc Jungle
able to used comms

Im like you sick of solo q and just wanting to have a bit of fun, Hit me up in game Matthews, or on here

Cheers
Sent you a request in game

Hi, I would love to join your team because i hate solo q as well. I have been playing casually for about 4 years. I like to metabreak and try weird build but i can be pretty serious if needed. I don't talk much unless required or someone talk to me first (LOL!).  I am a very tactical/strategical  person so i think a lot about team comp and each person strength so i know how i should play with anyone. I main support but i can play other role as well although it's going to be more supportive than carry.

I can't play until next weekend because of my overseas job. Other than that, I can play afterwards almost everyday except Thursday from 10 AM to 5 PM and more at night after 9 PM.

Add me in game (Uniucky) if you want to form a team. 
Cheers
Since we have 3 support main.. I'm willing to play whatever role left although i need a lot of practice
I'm down, support main, have a good amount of ranked 5s experience (was in a gold 3 team before reset). I fit all the requirements :).
